   22: %%
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpd_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: -compile({no_auto_import,[alias/1]}).
   26: -module(httpd_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("inets/include/httpd.hrl").
   32: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile(export_all).
   36: 
   37: -record(httpd_user,  {user_name, password, user_data}).
   38: -record(httpd_group, {group_name, userlist}).
   39: -define(MAX_HEADER_SIZE, 256).
   40: %% Minutes before failed auths timeout.
   41: -define(FAIL_EXPIRE_TIME,1).
   42: %% Seconds before successful auths timeout.
   43: -define(AUTH_TIMEOUT,5).
   44: -define(URL_START, "http://").
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{seconds, 120}}
   52:     ].
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [
   56:      {group, http_basic},
   57:      {group, https_basic},
   58:      {group, http_limit},
   59:      {group, https_limit},
   60:      {group, http_custom},
   61:      {group, https_custom},
   62:      {group, https_custom},
   63:      {group, http_basic_auth},
   64:      {group, https_basic_auth},
   65:      {group, http_auth_api},
   66:      {group, https_auth_api},
   67:      {group, http_auth_api_dets},
   68:      {group, https_auth_api_dets},
   69:      {group, http_auth_api_mnesia},
   70:      {group, https_auth_api_mnesia},
   71:      {group, http_security},
   72:      {group, https_security},
   73:      {group, http_reload},
   74:      {group, https_reload},
   75:      {group, http_default_type},
   76:      {group, http_mime_type},
   77:      {group, http_mime_and_default_type},
   78:      {group, http_mime_types},
   79:      {group, http_logging},
   80:      {group, http_post},
   81:      {group, http_rel_path_script_alias},
   82:      {group, http_not_sup},
   83:      {group, https_alert},
   84:      {group, https_not_sup},
   85:      {group, esi},
   86:      mime_types_format
   87:     ].
   88: 
   89: groups() ->
   90:     [
   91:      {http_basic, [], basic_groups()},
   92:      {https_basic, [], basic_groups()},
   93:      {http_limit, [], [{group, limit}]},
   94:      {https_limit, [], [{group, limit}]},
   95:      {http_custom, [], [{group,  custom}]},
   96:      {https_custom, [], [{group,  custom}]},
   97:      {http_basic_auth, [], [{group, basic_auth}]},
   98:      {https_basic_auth, [], [{group, basic_auth}]},
   99:      {http_auth_api, [], [{group, auth_api}]},
  100:      {https_auth_api, [], [{group, auth_api}]},
  101:      {http_auth_api_dets, [], [{group, auth_api_dets}]},
  102:      {https_auth_api_dets, [], [{group, auth_api_dets}]},
  103:      {http_auth_api_mnesia, [], [{group, auth_api_mnesia}]},
  104:      {https_auth_api_mnesia, [], [{group, auth_api_mnesia}]},
  105:      {http_security, [], [{group, security}]},
  106:      {https_security, [], [{group, security}]},
  107:      {http_logging, [], [{group, logging}]},
  108:      {http_reload, [], [{group, reload}]},
  109:      {https_reload, [], [{group, reload}]},
  110:      {http_post, [], [{group, post}]},
  111:      {http_not_sup, [], [{group, not_sup}]},
  112:      {https_not_sup, [], [{group, not_sup}]},
  113:      {https_alert, [], [tls_alert]},
  114:      {http_default_type, [], [default_type]},
  115:      {http_mime_type, [], [mime_type]},
  116:      {http_mime_and_default_type, [], [mime_and_default_type]},
  117:      {http_mime_types, [parallel], [alias_1_1, alias_1_0]},
  118:      {limit, [],  [content_length, max_clients_1_1]},
  119:      {custom, [],  [customize, add_default]},
  120:      {reload, [], [non_disturbing_reconfiger_dies,
  121: 		   disturbing_reconfiger_dies,
  122: 		   non_disturbing_1_1,
  123: 		   non_disturbing_1_0,
  124:            disturbing_1_1,
  125:            disturbing_1_0,
  126: 		   reload_config_file
  127: 		  ]},
  128:      {post, [], [chunked_post, chunked_chunked_encoded_post, post_204]},
  129:      {basic_auth, [], [basic_auth_1_1, basic_auth_1_0, verify_href_1_1]},
  130:      {auth_api, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  131:      {auth_api_dets, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  132:      {auth_api_mnesia, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  133:      {security, [], [security_1_1, security_1_0]},
  134:      {logging, [], [disk_log_internal, disk_log_exists,
  135:              disk_log_bad_size, disk_log_bad_file]},
  136:      {http_1_1, [], [esi_propagate, esi_atom_leak, {group, http_1_1_parallel}] ++ load()},
  137:      {http_1_1_parallel, [parallel],
  138:       [host, chunked, expect, cgi, cgi_chunked_encoding_test,
  139:        trace, range, if_modified_since, mod_esi_chunk_timeout,
  140:        esi_put, esi_patch, esi_post, esi_headers]
  141:       ++ http_head() ++ http_get()},
  142:      {http_1_0, [], [{group, http_1_0_parallel} | load()]},
  143:      {http_1_0_parallel, [parallel], [host, cgi, trace] ++ http_head() ++ http_get()},
  144:      {http_rel_path_script_alias, [], [cgi]},
  145:      {esi, [], [erl_script_timeout_default,
  146:                 erl_script_timeout_option,
  147:                 erl_script_timeout_proplist,
  148:                 erl_script_alias_all]},
  149:      {not_sup, [], [put_not_sup]}
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: basic_groups ()->
  153:     [{group, http_1_1},
  154:      {group, http_1_0}
  155:     ].
  156: 
  157: http_head() ->
  158:     [head].
  159: http_get() ->
  160:     [alias,
  161:      get,
  162:      bad_dot_paths,
  163:      %%actions, Add configuration so that this test mod_action
  164:      esi,
  165:      filename_too_long,
  166:      bad_hex,
  167:      missing_CR,
  168:      max_header,
  169:      max_content_length,
  170:      ignore_invalid_header,
  171:      ipv6,
  172:      same_file_name_dir_name
  173:     ].
  174: 
  175: 
  176: load() ->
  177:     [light, medium
  178:      %%,heavy
  179:     ].
  180: 
  181: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  182:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  183:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  184:     inets_test_lib:stop_apps([inets]),
  185:     ServerRoot = filename:join(PrivDir, "server_root"),
  186:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(ServerRoot),
  187:     DocRoot = filename:join(ServerRoot, "htdocs"),
  188:     setup_tmp_dir(PrivDir),
  189:     setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir),
  190:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
  191:     logger:add_handler_filter(default, inets_httpd, {fun logger_filters:domain/2,
  192:                                                      {log, equal,[otp,inets, httpd, httpd_test, error]}}),
  193:     %%logger:set_handler_config(default, formatter, {logger_formatter, #{}}),
  194:     Inet =
  195: 	case (catch ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
  196: 	    undefined ->
  197: 		inet;
  198: 	    Hosts when is_list(Hosts) ->
  199: 		case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), Hosts) of
  200: 		    true ->
  201: 			inet6;
  202: 		    false ->
  203: 			inet
  204: 		end;
  205: 	    _ ->
  206: 		inet
  207: 	end,
  208:     [{server_root, ServerRoot},
  209:      {doc_root, DocRoot},
  210:      {ipfamily, Inet},
  211:      {node,             node()},
  212:      {host,             inets_test_lib:hostname()},
  213:      {address,          getaddr()} | Config].
  214: 
  215: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  216:     ok.
  217: 
  218: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  219: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == https_basic;
  220: 				    Group == https_limit;
  221: 				    Group == https_custom;
  222: 				    Group == https_basic_auth;
  223: 				    Group == https_auth_api;
  224: 				    Group == https_auth_api_dets;
  225: 				    Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
  226: 				    Group == https_security;
  227: 				    Group == https_reload;
  228:                                     Group == https_not_sup;
  229:                                     Group == https_alert
  230: 				    ->
  231:     catch crypto:stop(),
  232:     try crypto:start() of
  233:         ok ->
  234:             init_ssl(Group,  [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config0])
  235:     catch
  236:         _:_ ->
  237:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  238:     end;
  239: init_per_group(Group, Config0)  when  Group == http_basic;
  240: 				      Group == http_limit;
  241: 				      Group == http_custom;
  242: 				      Group == http_basic_auth;
  243: 				      Group == http_auth_api;
  244: 				      Group == http_auth_api_dets;
  245: 				      Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;
  246: 				      Group == http_security;
  247: 				      Group == http_reload;
  248:                                       Group == http_not_sup;
  249:                                       Group == http_post;
  250:                                       Group == http_default_type;
  251:                                       Group == http_mime_type;
  252: 				      Group == http_mime_and_default_type;
  253:                                       Group == http_mime_types
  254: 				      ->
  255:     ok = start_apps(Group),
  256:     init_httpd(Group, [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"}, {type, ip_comm} | Config0]);
  257: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == http_1_1_parallel;
  258:                                    Group == http_1_1 ->
  259:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config];
  260: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == http_1_0_parallel;
  261:                                    Group == http_1_0 ->
  262:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config];
  263: init_per_group(auth_api, Config) -> 
  264:     [{auth_prefix, ""} | Config];
  265: init_per_group(auth_api_dets, Config) -> 
  266:     [{auth_prefix, "dets_"} | Config];
  267: init_per_group(auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
  268:     start_mnesia(proplists:get_value(node, Config)),
  269:     [{auth_prefix, "mnesia_"} | Config];
  270: init_per_group(http_logging, Config) ->
  271:     Config1 = [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config],
  272:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config1),
  273:     Path = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  274:     [{transfer_log, Path} | Config1];
  275: init_per_group(http_rel_path_script_alias = Group, Config) ->
  276:     ok = start_apps(Group),
  277:     init_httpd(Group, [{type, ip_comm},{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"}| Config]);
  278: init_per_group(not_sup, Config) ->
  279:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config];
  280: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == esi ->
  281:     ok = start_apps(Group),
  282:     Config;
  283: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  284:     Config.
  285: 
  286: end_per_group(Group, _Config)  when  Group == http_basic;
  287: 				     Group == http_limit;
  288: 				     Group == http_basic_auth;
  289: 				     Group == http_auth_api;
  290: 				     Group == http_auth_api_dets;
  291: 				     Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;
  292: 				     Group == http_security;
  293: 				     Group == http_reload;
  294:                                      Group == http_post;
  295:                                      Group == http_default_type;
  296:                                      Group == http_mime_type;
  297: 				     Group == http_mime_and_default_type;
  298:                                      Group == http_mime_types;
  299:                                      Group == esi
  300: 				     ->
  301:     inets:stop();
  302: end_per_group(Group, _Config) when  Group == https_basic;
  303: 				    Group == https_limit;
  304: 				    Group == https_basic_auth;
  305: 				    Group == https_auth_api;
  306: 				    Group == https_auth_api_dets;
  307: 				    Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
  308: 				    Group == https_security;
  309: 				    Group == https_reload
  310: 				    ->
  311:     ssl:stop(),
  312:     inets:stop();
  313: 
  314: end_per_group(auth_api_mnesia, _) ->
  315:     cleanup_mnesia();
  316: 
  317: end_per_group(_, _) ->
  318:     ok.
  319: 
  320: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  321: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == host; Case == trace ->
  322:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 40}),
  323:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  324:     Name = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  325:     Cb = case Name of
  326: 	     http_1_0 ->
  327: 		 httpd_1_0;
  328: 	     http_1_0_parallel ->
  329: 		 httpd_1_0;
  330: 	     http_1_1 ->
  331: 		 httpd_1_1;
  332: 	     http_1_1_parallel ->
  333: 		 httpd_1_1
  334: 	 end,
  335:     dbg(
  336:       Case,
  337:       [{version_cb, Cb} | proplists:delete(version_cb, Config)],
  338:       init);
  339: 
  340: init_per_testcase(range, Config) ->
  341:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  342:     DocRoot = proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config),
  343:     create_range_data(DocRoot),
  344:     dbg(range, Config, init);
  345: 
  346: init_per_testcase(disk_log_internal, Config0) ->
  347:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  348:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  349:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  350:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  351: 
  352: init_per_testcase(disk_log_exists, Config0) ->
  353:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  354:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  355:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name, Filename}, {file, Filename},
  356:             {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
  357:             {type, wrap}, {size, {1048576, 5}}]),
  358:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, {bogus, node(), self()}),
  359:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
  360:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  361:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  362:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  363:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  364: 
  365: init_per_testcase(disk_log_bad_size, Config0) ->
  366:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  367:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  368:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name, Filename}, {file, Filename},
  369:             {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
  370:             {type, wrap}, {size, {1048576, 5}}]),
  371:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, {bogus, node(), self()}),
  372:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
  373:     ok = file:delete(Filename ++ ".siz"),
  374:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  375:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  376:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  377:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  378: 
  379: init_per_testcase(disk_log_bad_file, Config0) ->
  380:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  381:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  382:     ok = file:write_file(Filename ++ ".1", <<>>),
  383:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  384:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  385:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  386:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  387: 
  388: init_per_testcase(erl_script_timeout_default, Config) ->
  389:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 60}),
  390:     dbg(erl_script_timeout_default, Config, init);
  391: init_per_testcase(medium = Case, Config) ->
  392:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 150}),
  393:     dbg(Case, Config, init);
  394: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  395:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  396:     dbg(Case, Config, init).
  397: 
  398: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when
  399:         Case == disk_log_internal;
  400:         Case == disk_log_exists;
  401:         Case == disk_log_bad_size;
  402:         Case == disk_log_bad_file ->
  403:     inets:stop(),
  404:     dbg(Case, Config, 'end');
  405: 
  406: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  407:     dbg(Case, Config, 'end').
  408: 
  409: 
  410: dbg(Case, Config, Status) ->
  411:     Cases = [],
  412:     case lists:member(Case, Cases) of
  413: 	true ->
  414: 	    case Status of
  415: 		init ->
  416: 		    dbg:tracer(),
  417: 		    dbg:p(all, c),
  418: 		    dbg:tpl(httpd_example, cx),
  419: 		    dbg:tpl(mod_esi, generate_webpage, cx),
  420: 		    io:format("dbg: started~n"),
  421: 		    Config;
  422: 		'end' ->
  423: 		    io:format("dbg: stopped~n"),
  424: 		    dbg:stop(),
  425: 		    ok
  426: 	    end;
  427: 	false ->
  428: 	    case Status of
  429: 		init ->
  430: 		    Config;
  431: 		'end' ->
  432: 		    ok
  433: 	    end
  434:     end.
  435: 
  436: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  437: %% Test cases starts here.
  438: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  439: 
  440: head() ->
  441:     [{doc, "HTTP HEAD request for static page"}].
  442: 
  443: head(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  444:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  445:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  446:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  447: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  448:                                        proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  449: 				       http_request("HEAD /index.html ", Version, Host),
  450: 				       [{statuscode, head_status(Version, 200)},
  451: 					{version, Version}]),
  452:     
  453:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  454: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  455: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  456: 				       http_request("HEAD /open/ ", Version, Host),
  457: 				       [{statuscode, head_status(Version, 403)},
  458: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  459: 					{header, "Date"},
  460: 					{header, "Server"},
  461: 					{version, Version}]).
  462: 
  463: get() ->
  464:     [{doc, "HTTP GET request for static page"}].
  465: 
  466: get(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  467:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  468:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  469:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  470:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  471: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  472: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  473: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  474: 				       http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
  475: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
  476: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  477: 					{header, "Date"},
  478: 					{header, "Server"},
  479: 					{version, Version}]),
  480:     
  481:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  482: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  483: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  484: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  485: 				       http_request("GET /open/ ", Version, Host),
  486: 				       [{statuscode, 403},
  487: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  488: 					{header, "Date"},
  489: 					{header, "Server"},
  490: 					{version, Version}]),
  491: 
  492:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  493: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  494: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  495: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  496: 				       http_request("GET /.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/home/ ", Version, Host),
  497: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  498: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  499: 					{header, "Date"},
  500: 					{header, "Server"},
  501: 					{version, Version}]).
  502: 
  503: bad_dot_paths() ->
  504:     [{doc, "Do not allow ..-paths to acesse files outside of doc root"}].
  505: bad_dot_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  506:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  507:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  508:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  509:     
  510:     BadDotPath0 = "/..%2f..%2f...%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2fetc/passwd ",
  511:     BadDotPath1 = "/..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2fetc/passwd ",
  512:     BadDotPath2 = "/%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2fetc/passwd ",
  513:     
  514:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  515: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  516: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  517: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  518: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath0 , Version, Host),
  519: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  520: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  521: 					{header, "Date"},
  522: 					{header, "Server"},
  523: 					{version, Version}]),
  524:     
  525:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  526: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  527: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  528: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  529: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath1, Version, Host),
  530: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  531: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  532: 					{header, "Date"},
  533: 					{header, "Server"},
  534: 					{version, Version}]),
  535:     
  536:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  537: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  538: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  539: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  540: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath2, Version, Host),
  541: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  542: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  543: 					{header, "Date"},
  544: 					{header, "Server"},
  545: 					{version, Version}]).
  546:     
  547: basic_auth_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  548:     basic_auth([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  549: 
  550: basic_auth_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  551:     basic_auth([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
  552: 
  553: basic_auth() ->
  554:     [{doc, "Test Basic authentication with WWW-Authenticate header"}].
  555: 
  556: basic_auth(Config) ->
  557:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  558:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  559:     basic_auth_requiered(Config),
  560:     %% Authentication OK! ["one:OnePassword" user first in user list]
  561:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  562: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  563:     %% Authentication OK and a directory listing is supplied!
  564:     %% ["Aladdin:open sesame" user second in user list]
  565:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  566: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  567:      %% User correct but wrong password! ["one:one" user first in user list]
  568:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "one", Version, Host), Config, 
  569: 		     [{statuscode, 401},
  570: 		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  571:     %% Make sure Authenticate header is received even the second time
  572:     %% we try a incorrect password! Otherwise a browser client will hang!
  573:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "one", Version, Host), Config, 
  574: 		     [{statuscode, 401},
  575: 		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  576:     %% Neither user or password correct! ["dummy:dummy"]
  577:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "dummy", "dummy", Version, Host), Config, 
  578: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  579:     %% Nested secret/top_secret OK! ["Aladdin:open sesame"]
  580:     ok = http_status(auth_request("/secret/top_secret/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), 
  581: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  582:     %% Authentication still required!
  583:     basic_auth_requiered(Config).
  584: 
  585: verify_href_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  586:     verify_href([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  587: 
  588: verify_href() ->
  589:     [{doc, "Test generated hrefs (related to GH-4677), check that hrefs for dir listing work"}].
  590: 
  591: verify_href(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  592:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  593:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  594:     Go = fun(Path, User, Password, Opts) ->
  595:                  ct:pal("Navigating to ~p", [Path]),
  596:                  auth_status(auth_request(Path, User, Password, Version, Host),
  597:                              Config, Opts)
  598:          end,
  599:     {ok, Hrefs} = Go("/open/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", [{statuscode, 200}, {fetch_hrefs, true}]),
  600:     [ok = Go(H, "one", "onePassword", [{statuscode, 200}]) || H <- Hrefs],
  601:     ok.
  602: 
  603: auth_api_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  604:     auth_api([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  605: 
  606: auth_api_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  607:     auth_api([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
  608: 
  609: auth_api() ->
  610:     [{doc, "Test mod_auth API"}].
  611: 
  612: auth_api(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  613:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(auth_prefix, Config),
  614:     do_auth_api(Prefix, Config).
  615: 
  616: do_auth_api(AuthPrefix, Config) ->
  617:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  618:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  619:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  620:     Node = proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  621:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
  622:     ok = http_status("GET / ", Config,
  623:  		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  624:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/", "one", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), Config,
  625:  		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  626: 
  627:     %% Make sure Authenticate header is received even the second time
  628:     %% we try a incorrect password! Otherwise a browser client will hang!
  629:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  630:  				  "dummy", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  631:  		     [{statuscode, 401},
  632:  		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  633:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", "dummy", "WrongPassword", 
  634:  				  Version, Host), Config, [{statuscode, 401},	
  635:  						  {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  636:     
  637:     %% Change the password to DummyPassword then try to add a user 
  638:     %% Get an error and set it to NoPassword
  639:     ok = update_password(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, 
  640: 			     "open", "NoPassword", "DummyPassword"),
  641:     {error,bad_password} = 
  642:  	add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "one", 
  643:  		 "onePassword", []),
  644:      ok = update_password(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open",
  645: 			  "DummyPassword", "NoPassword"),
  646:   
  647:     %% Test /*open, require user one Aladdin
  648:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open"),
  649:     
  650:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  651:      				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config,
  652: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  653:     
  654:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  655: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  656: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  657:  
  658:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  659: 				  "Aladdin", "onePassword", Version, Host),
  660: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  661:     
  662:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "one", 
  663: 		    "onePassword", []),
  664:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "two", 
  665:      		    "twoPassword", []),
  666:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "Aladdin", 
  667: 		    "AladdinPassword", []),
  668:     {ok, [_|_]} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  669:       			     AuthPrefix, "open"),
  670:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  671:       				  "one", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), 
  672:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  673:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  674:       				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), 
  675:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  676:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  677:       				  "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), 
  678:       		     Config,[{statuscode, 401}]),
  679:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  680:       				  "Aladdin", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), 
  681:       		     Config,[{statuscode, 401}]),
  682:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",  
  683: 				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), 
  684: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  685:     
  686:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open"),
  687:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  688: 			  AuthPrefix, "open"),
  689:     
  690:     %% Phase 2
  691:       remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  692:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix,
  693: 			  "secret"),
  694:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  695:        				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), 
  696:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  697:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  698: 				    "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), 
  699: 		       Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  700:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  701:       				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  702:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  703:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "one",
  704:       	     "onePassword", 
  705:       	     []),
  706:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  707:       	     "two", "twoPassword", []),
  708:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "Aladdin", 
  709: 	     "AladdinPassword",[]),
  710:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  711:       		     "one", "group1"),
  712:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  713:       		     "two", "group1"),
  714:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix,  
  715:       			 "secret", "Aladdin", "group2"),
  716:     {ok, Members} = list_group_members(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "group1"),
  717:     true = lists:member("one", Members),
  718:     true = lists:member("two", Members),
  719:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  720:       				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host),
  721:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  722:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  723: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  724: 		       Config,[{statuscode, 200}]),
  725:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  726:        				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host),
  727:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  728:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  729:        				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host), 
  730:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  731:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  732:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  733:        			  AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  734:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  735:     
  736:     {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  737:     
  738:     %% Phase 3
  739:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  740:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  741:     
  742:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  743:       				      "secret/top_secret/",
  744:       				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  745:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  746:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  747:       				      "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  748:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  749:      add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix,
  750: 	      "secret/top_secret","three",
  751: 	      "threePassword",[]),
  752:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret",
  753:       	     "two","twoPassword", []),
  754:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret", "three", "group3"),
  755:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  756:      				      "secret/top_secret/", "three", "threePassword",
  757:      				  Version, Host), 
  758: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  759:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  760: 				       "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  761: 		      Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  762:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret", "two", "group3"),
  763:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  764: 				       "secret/top_secret/",
  765: 				   "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  766: 		      Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  767:      remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  768:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  769:      			  AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  770:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  771:      {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix,  "secret/top_secret"),
  772:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  773:        				      "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), 
  774: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  775:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  776:        				      "secret/top_secret/","three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  777:        		     Config, [{statuscde, 401}]).
  778: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  779: ipv6() ->
  780:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
  781:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
  782: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  783:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
  784:      case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
  785: 	 true ->
  786: 	     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  787: 	     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  788: 	     URI = http_request("GET / ", Version, Host),
  789: 	     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  790:  					  proplists:get_value(port, Config), [inet6], 
  791: 					   proplists:get_value(code, Config), 
  792: 					   URI, 
  793: 					   [{statuscode, 200}, {version, Version}]);
  794: 	 false ->
  795: 	     {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
  796:      end.
  797: 
  798: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  799: same_file_name_dir_name() ->
  800:     [{doc,"Test that URI path that has a filename in it is not interpreted as the file"}].
  801: same_file_name_dir_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  802:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  803:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  804:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  805:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host,
  806:                                        proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  807:                                        transport_opts(Type, Config),
  808:                                        proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  809:                                        http_request("GET /index.html/foo.html ", Version, Host),
  810:                                        [{statuscode, 404},
  811:                                         {version, Version}]).

  813: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  814: chunked_post() ->
  815:     [{doc,"Test option max_client_body_chunk"}].
  816: chunked_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  817:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  818:                        {"Content-Length:833 \r\n",
  819:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  820:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  821:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  822:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  823:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  824:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  825:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  826:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  827:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  828:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  829:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  830:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  831:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  832:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  833:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  834:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  835:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"},
  836:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} |Config], 
  837:                      [{statuscode, 200}]),
  838:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  839:                      {"Content-Length:2 \r\n",
  840:                         "ZZ"
  841:                      },
  842:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} |Config], 
  843:                      [{statuscode, 200}]).
  844: 
  845: chunked_chunked_encoded_post() ->
  846:     [{doc,"Test option max_client_body_chunk with chunked client encoding"}].
  847: chunked_chunked_encoded_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  848:     Chunk = http_chunk:encode("ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"),
  849:     LastChunk = http_chunk:encode_last(),
  850:     Chunks = lists:duplicate(10000, Chunk),
  851:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  852:                      {"Transfer-Encoding:chunked \r\n",
  853:                       [Chunks | LastChunk]},
  854:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], 
  855:                      [{statuscode, 200}]).
  856: 
  857: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  858: post_204() ->
  859:     [{doc,"Test that 204 responses are not chunk encoded"}].
  860: post_204(Config) ->
  861:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  862:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  863:     SockType = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  864:     TranspOpts = transport_opts(SockType, Config),
  865:     Request = "POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204 ",
  866: 
  867:     try inets_test_lib:connect_bin(SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts) of
  868: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  869:             RequestStr = http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1", Host),
  870: 	    ok = inets_test_lib:send(SockType, Socket, RequestStr),
  871:             receive
  872:                 {tcp, Socket, Data} ->
  873:                     case binary:match(Data, <<"chunked">>,[]) of
  874:                         nomatch ->
  875:                             ok;
  876:                         {_, _} ->
  877:                             ct:fail("Chunked encoding detected.")
  878:                     end
  879:             after 2000 ->
  880:                     ct:fail(connection_timed_out)
  881:             end;
  882: 	ConnectError ->
  883: 	    ct:fail({connect_error, ConnectError,
  884: 		     [SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts]})
  885:     catch
  886: 	T:E:Stk ->
  887: 	    ct:fail({connect_failure,
  888: 		     [{type,       T},
  889: 		      {error,      E},
  890: 		      {stacktrace, Stk},
  891: 		      {args,       [SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts]}]})
  892:     end.
  893: 
  894: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  895: host() ->
  896:     [{doc, "Test host header"}].
  897: 
  898: host(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  899:     Cb = proplists:get_value(version_cb, Config),
  900:     Cb:host(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  901: 	    proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  902: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  903: chunked() ->
  904:     [{doc, "Check that the server accepts chunked requests."}].
  905: 
  906: chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  907:     httpd_1_1:chunked(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  908: 		      proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  909: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  910: expect() ->   
  911:     [{doc, "Check that the server handles request with the expect header "
  912:       "field appropriate"}].
  913: expect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  914:     httpd_1_1:expect(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  915: 		     proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  916: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  917: max_clients_1_1() ->
  918:     [{doc, "Test max clients limit"}].
  919: 
  920: max_clients_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  921:     do_max_clients([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  922:

  948: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  949: esi() ->
  950:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi"}].
  951: 
  952: esi(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  953:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example ", 
  954: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 400}]),
  955:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
  956: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  957:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:"
  958: 		     "get?input=4711 ", Config,
  959: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  960:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post ",
  961: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  962:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/not_allowed:post ",
  963: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 403}]),
  964:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:undef ",
  965: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
  966:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example/yahoo ",
  967: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 302}]),
  968:     %% Check "ErlScriptNoCache" directive (default: false)
  969:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
  970: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200},
  971: 		      {no_header, "cache-control"}]),
  972:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:peer ",
  973: 	  	     Config, [{statuscode, 200},
  974:                               {header, "peer-cert-exist", peer(Config)}]),
  975:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:new_status_and_location ",
  976:                      Config, [{statuscode, 201},
  977:                               {header, "location"}]).
  978:

 1016: esi_propagate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1017:     register(propagate_test, self()),
 1018:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:new_status_and_location ",
 1019:                   Config, [{statuscode, 201}]),
 1020:     receive
 1021:         {status, 201} ->
 1022:             ok;
 1023:         Err ->
 1024:             ct:fail(Err)
 1025:     end.        
 1026: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1027: esi_atom_leak() ->
 1028:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi for atom leakage - verify module, function names and HTTP headers"}].
 1029: 
 1030: esi_atom_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1031:     NumberStrings = [integer_to_list(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1032: 
 1033:     NotExistingModule =
 1034:         ["GET /cgi-bin/erl/not_existing_" ++ S ++":get " || S <- NumberStrings],
 1035:     %% check atom count after first HTTP call, to ignore count increase upon initial module loading
 1036:     GetFun = fun(Url, HeadersAndBody, Expected) ->
 1037:                      ok = http_status(Url, HeadersAndBody, Config, Expected),
 1038:                      erlang:system_info(atom_count)
 1039:              end,
 1040:     AtomCount1 = [GetFun(U, {"", ""}, [{statuscode, 404}]) || U <- NotExistingModule],
 1041:     IsStable = fun(L) -> lists:max(L) == lists:min(L) end,
 1042:     true = IsStable(AtomCount1),
 1043: 
 1044:     NotExistingFunction =
 1045:         ["GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:not_existing" ++ S ++ " "
 1046:          || S <- NumberStrings],
 1047:     AtomCount2 = [GetFun(U, {"", ""}, [{statuscode, 404}]) || U <- NotExistingFunction],
 1048:     true = IsStable(AtomCount2),
 1049: 
 1050:     NotExistingHdr =
 1051:         [{"NotExistingHeader_" ++ S ++ ":100 \r\n", ""} || S <- NumberStrings],
 1052:     AtomCount3 = [GetFun("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ", H, [{statuscode, 200}])
 1053:                   || H <- NotExistingHdr],
 1054:     true = IsStable(AtomCount3).
 1055: 
 1056: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1057: esi_headers() ->
 1058:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi HTTP headers support"}].
 1059: 
 1060: esi_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1061:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get_reply_headers ",
 1062:                      {"Accept-Encoding: gzip \r\nNotExistingHeader_1: 100 \r\n", ""},
 1063:                      Config, [{statuscode, 200}, {header, "notexistingheader_1", "100"},
 1064:                               {header, "accept-encoding", "gzip"}]).
 1065: 
 1066: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1067: cgi() ->
 1068:     [{doc, "Test mod_cgi"}].
 1069: 
 1070: cgi(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1071:     {Script, Script2, Script3} =
 1072: 	case os:type() of
 1073: 	    {win32, _} ->
 1074: 		{"printenv.bat", "printenv.sh", "cgi_echo.exe"};
 1075: 	    _ ->
 1076: 		{"printenv.sh", "printenv.bat", "cgi_echo"}
 1077: 	end,
 1078: 
 1079:      %%The length (> 100) is intentional
 1080:      ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/" ++ Script3 ++ " ", 
 1081:      		     {"Content-Length:100 \r\n",
 1082:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1083:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1084:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1085:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1086:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1087:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1088:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1089:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1090:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1091:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1092:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1093:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1094:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1095:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1096:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1097:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1098:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"}, 
 1099: 		      Config,
 1100:      		     [{statuscode, 200},
 1101:      		      {header, "content-type", "text/plain"}]),
 1102:     
 1103:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/"++ Script ++ " ", Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1104: 
 1105:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/not_there ", Config, 
 1106: 		     [{statuscode, 404}, {statuscode, 500}]),
 1107:     
 1108:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/"++ Script ++ "?Nisse:kkk?sss/lll ", 
 1109:      		     Config,
 1110:      		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1111:     
 1112:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/"++ Script  ++ " ", Config,
 1113: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1114:     
 1115:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",  Config,
 1116: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1117:     
 1118:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/not_there ", Config,
 1119: 		     [{statuscode, 404},{statuscode, 500}]),
 1120:     
 1121:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/"++ Script ++ "?Nisse:kkk?sss/lll ", Config, 
 1122:      		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1123:     
 1124:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",   Config,
 1125: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1126:     
 1127:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",  Config,
 1128: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1129:     
 1130:     %% Execute an existing, but bad CGI script..
 1131:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script2 ++ " ",  Config, 
 1132: 		     [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1133:     
 1134:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/"++ Script2 ++ " ", Config,
 1135: 		     [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1136:     
 1137:     %% Check "ScriptNoCache" directive (default: false)
 1138:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/" ++ Script ++ " ", Config,
 1139: 		     [{statuscode, 200},
 1140: 		      {no_header, "cache-control"}]).
 1141: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1142: cgi_chunked_encoding_test() ->  
 1143:     [{doc, "Test chunked encoding together with mod_cgi "}].
 1144: cgi_chunked_encoding_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1145:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1146:     Script =
 1147: 	case os:type() of
 1148: 	    {win32, _} ->
 1149: 		"/cgi-bin/printenv.bat";
 1150: 	    _ ->
 1151: 		"/cgi-bin/printenv.sh"
 1152: 	end,
 1153:     Requests = 
 1154: 	["GET " ++ Script ++ " HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:"++ Host ++"\r\n\r\n",
 1155: 	 "GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example/newformat  HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:"
 1156: 	 ++ Host ++"\r\n\r\n"],
 1157:     httpd_1_1:mod_cgi_chunked_encoding_test(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1158: 					    Host,
 1159: 					    proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1160: 					    Requests).
 1161: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1162: default_type() ->
 1163:     [{doc, "Test default_type"}].
 1164: 
 1165: default_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1166:     TestURIs200 = [
 1167:                    {"GET /file_without_extension ", 200, "text/html"},
 1168:                    {"GET /file.with_nonstandard_extension ", 200, "text/html"}
 1169:                   ],
 1170:     Test200 =
 1171:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType}) ->
 1172:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s",
 1173:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType]),
 1174:                 ok = http_status(Request, Config,
 1175:                                  [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1176:                                   {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1177:                                   {header, "Server"},
 1178:                                   {header, "Date"}])
 1179:         end,
 1180:     [Test200(T) || T <- TestURIs200],
 1181:     ok.
 1182:

 1191:                   ],
 1192:     Test200 =
 1193:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType}) ->
 1194:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s",
 1195:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType]),
 1196:                 ok = http_status(Request, Config,
 1197:                                  [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1198:                                   {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1199:                                   {header, "Server"},
 1200:                                   {header, "Date"}])
 1201:         end,

 1213:                   ],
 1214:     Test200 =
 1215:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType}) ->
 1216:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s",
 1217:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType]),
 1218:                 ok = http_status(Request, Config,
 1219:                                  [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1220:                                   {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1221:                                   {header, "Server"},
 1222:                                   {header, "Date"}])

 1227: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1228: alias_1_1() ->
 1229:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1230: 
 1231: alias_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1232:     alias([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1233: 
 1234: alias_1_0() ->
 1235:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1236:   
 1237: alias_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1238:     alias([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1239: 
 1240: alias() ->
 1241:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1242: 
 1243: alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1244:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 1245:         {win32, _} ->
 1246:             "printenv.bat";
 1247:         _ ->
 1248:             "printenv.sh"
 1249:     end,
 1250:     TestURIs200 = [
 1251:                    {"GET /pics/icon.sheet.gif ", 200, "image/gif"},
 1252:                    {"GET /pictures/icon.sheet.gif ", 200, "image/gif"},
 1253:                    {"GET / ", 200, "text/html"},
 1254:                    {"GET /misc/ ", 200, "text/html"},
 1255:                    {"GET /cgi-bin/" ++ Cgi ++ " ", 200, "text/html"},
 1256:                    {"GET /cgi-UNWANTED-bin/" ++ Cgi ++ " ", 200, "text/html"}
 1257:                   ],
 1258:     Test200 =
 1259:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType}) ->
 1260:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s",
 1261:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType]),
 1262:                 ok = http_status(Request, Config,
 1263:                                  [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1264:                                   {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1265:                                   {header, "Server"},
 1266:                                   {header, "Date"}])
 1267:         end,
 1268:     [Test200(T) || T <- TestURIs200],
 1269:     TestURIs301 =
 1270:         [
 1271:          %% Check redirection if trailing slash is missing.
 1272:          {"GET /misc ", 301, "text/html", "&#47;misc&#47;$"},
 1273:          %% slash character expected after path(misc) not query component
 1274:          {"GET /misc?test=test ", 301, "text/html", "&#47;misc&#47;\\?test=test$"}
 1275:         ],
 1276:     Test301 =
 1277:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType, TargetLinkRegexp}) ->
 1278:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s RE: ~s",
 1279:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType, TargetLinkRegexp]),
 1280:                 {ok, [RedirectLink]} =
 1281:                     http_status(Request, Config,
 1282:                                 [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1283:                                  {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1284:                                  {header, "Server"},
 1285:                                  {header, "Date"},
 1286:                                  {fetch_hrefs, true}]),
 1287:                 ReResult = re:run(RedirectLink, TargetLinkRegexp),
 1288:                 ct:log("RedirectLink = ~p", [RedirectLink]),
 1289:                 ?assertMatch({match, _}, ReResult)
 1290:               end,
 1291:     [Test301(T) || T <- TestURIs301],
 1292:     ok.
 1293:

 1344: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1345: content_length() ->
 1346:     ["Tests that content-length is correct OTP-5775"].
 1347: content_length(Config) ->
 1348:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1349:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1350:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
 1351: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1352: 				       http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get_bin ", 
 1353: 						    Version, Host), 
 1354: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1355: 					{content_length, 274},
 1356: 					{version, Version}]).
 1357: 
 1358: %-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1359: filename_too_long() ->
 1360:     [{doc, "Tests what happens if supplied filename exceeds os-limit of filename characters."}].
 1361: filename_too_long(Config) ->
 1362:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1363:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1364:     TooLongFileName = lists:duplicate(257, $F),
 1365:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
 1366: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1367: 				       http_request("GET /" ++ TooLongFileName ++ " ", Version, Host),
 1368: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
 1369: 					{version, Version}]).
 1370: 
 1371: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1372: bad_hex() ->
 1373:     [{doc, "Tests that a URI with a bad hexadecimal code is handled OTP-6003"}].
 1374: bad_hex(Config) ->
 1375:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1376:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1377:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
 1378: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1379: 				       http_request("GET http://www.erlang.org/%skalle ",
 1380: 						    Version, Host),
 1381: 				       [{statuscode, 400},
 1382: 					{version, Version}]).
 1383: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1384: missing_CR() ->
 1385:      [{doc, "Tests missing CR in delimiter OTP-7304"}].
 1386: missing_CR(Config) ->
 1387:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1388:     Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1389:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
 1390: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1391: 				       http_request_missing_CR("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
 1392: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1393: 					{version, Version}]).
 1394: 
 1395: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1396: customize() ->
 1397:     [{doc, "Test filtering of headers with custom callback"}].
 1398: 
 1399: customize(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1400:     Version = "HTTP/1.1",
 1401:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1402:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1403:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 1404: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 1405: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 1406: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1407: 				       http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
 1408: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1409: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
 1410: 					{header, "Date"},
 1411: 					{no_header, "Server"},
 1412: 					{version, Version}]).
 1413: 
 1414: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1415: add_default() ->
 1416:     [{doc, "Test adding default header with custom callback"}].
 1417: 
 1418: add_default(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1419:     Version = "HTTP/1.1",
 1420:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1421:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1422:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 1423: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 1424: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 1425: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1426: 				       http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
 1427: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1428: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
 1429: 					{header, "Date", "Override-date"},
 1430: 					{header, "X-Frame-Options"},
 1431: 					{version, Version}]).

 1433: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1434: max_header() ->
 1435:     [{doc, "Denial Of Service (DOS) attack, prevented by max_header"}].
 1436: max_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1437:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1438:     Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1439:     case Version of
 1440:  	"HTTP/0.9" ->
 1441:  	    {skip, not_implemented};
 1442:  	_ ->
 1443:  	    dos_hostname(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), Host, 
 1444:  			 proplists:get_value(node, Config), Version, ?MAX_HEADER_SIZE)
 1445:     end.
 1446: 
 1447: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1448: max_content_length() ->
 1449:     [{doc, "Denial Of Service (DOS) attack, prevented by max_content_length"}].
 1450: max_content_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1451:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1452:     Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1453:     garbage_content_length(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), Host, 
 1454: 			   proplists:get_value(node, Config), Version).
 1455: 
 1456: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1457: ignore_invalid_header() ->
 1458:     [{doc, "RFC 7230 - 3.2.4 ... No whitespace is allowed between the header field-name and colon"}].
 1459: ignore_invalid_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1460:      Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1461:      Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1462:     {Url, Header, Opts} =
 1463:         case proplists:get_value(type, Config) of
 1464:             ip_comm ->
 1465:                 {"http://"  ++ Host ++  ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:ignore_invalid_header",
 1466:                  [{"Host", "localhost"},{"Te", ""}, {"Content-Length ", "0"}], []};
 1467:             ssl ->
 1468:                 Conf = proplists:get_value(client_config, proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config)),
 1469:                 {"https://"  ++ Host ++  ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:ignore_invalid_header",
 1470:                  [{"Host", "localhost"},{"Te", ""}, {"Content-Length ", "0"}], [{ssl, [{verify, verify_none} | Conf]}]}
 1471:         end,
 1472:     {ok,{{_,204,_}, _, _}}
 1473:         = httpc:request(get, {Url, Header}, [{timeout, 45000} | Opts], [{headers_as_is, true}]).
 1474: 
 1475: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1476: security_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1477:     security([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1478: 
 1479: security_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1480:     security([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1481: 
 1482: security() ->
 1483:     ["Test mod_security"].
 1484: security(Config) ->
 1485:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1486:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1487:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1488:     Node = proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1489:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 1490: 
 1491:     yes = global:register_name(mod_security_test, self()),   % Receive events
 1492: 
 1493:     OpenDir = filename:join([ServerRoot, "htdocs", "open"]),
 1494: 
 1495:     %% Test blocking / unblocking of users.
 1496: 
 1497:     %% /open, require user one Aladdin
 1498:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, "", "open"),
 1499: 
 1500:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/",
 1501:      				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config,
 1502: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1503:     
 1504:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1505: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "onePassword"}]},
 1506: 			   Node, Port),
 1507:     
 1508:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/",
 1509: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1510: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1511:  
 1512:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1513: 			    [{user, "two"}, {password, "twoPassword"}]},
 1514: 			   Node, Port),
 1515: 
 1516:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", 
 1517: 				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host),
 1518: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1519:     
 1520:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1521: 			    [{user, "Aladdin"},
 1522: 			     {password, "AladdinPassword"}]},
 1523: 			   Node, Port),
 1524: 
 1525:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, "", "open", "one", "onePassword", []),
 1526:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, "", "open", "two", "twoPassword", []),
 1527: 
 1528:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1529: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1530:     
 1531:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1532: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "WrongPassword"}]},
 1533: 			   Node, Port),
 1534: 
 1535:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1536: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1537:     
 1538:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1539: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "WrongPassword"}]},
 1540: 			   Node, Port),
 1541:     receive_security_event({event, user_block, Port, OpenDir,
 1542: 			    [{user, "one"}]}, Node, Port),
 1543:     
 1544:     global:unregister_name(mod_security_test),   % No more events.
 1545:     
 1546:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1547: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1548:     
 1549:     %% User "one" should be blocked now..    
 1550:     case list_blocked_users(Node, Port) of
 1551: 	[{"one",_, Port, OpenDir,_}] ->
 1552: 	    ok;
 1553: 	Blocked ->
 1554: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_blocked, Blocked})
 1555:     end,
 1556: 
 1557:     [{"one",_, Port, OpenDir,_}] = list_blocked_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1558: 
 1559:     true = unblock_user(Node, "one", Port, OpenDir),
 1560:     %% User "one" should not be blocked any more.
 1561: 
 1562:     [] = list_blocked_users(Node, Port),
 1563: 
 1564:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1565: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1566: 
 1567:     %% Test list_auth_users & auth_timeout
 1568: 
 1569:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1570: 
 1571:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1572: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1573: 
 1574:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1575: 
 1576:    
 1577:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1578: 
 1579:    
 1580:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1581: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1582: 
 1583:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1584: 
 1585:   
 1586:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1587: 
 1588:     %% Wait for successful auth to timeout.
 1589:     ct:sleep(?AUTH_TIMEOUT*1001),  
 1590: 
 1591:     [] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1592: 
 1593:     [] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1594: 
 1595:     %% "two" is blocked.
 1596: 
 1597:     true = unblock_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir),
 1598: 
 1599: 
 1600:     %% Test explicit blocking. Block user 'two'.
 1601: 
 1602:     [] = list_blocked_users(Node,Port,OpenDir),
 1603: 
 1604:     true = block_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir, 10),
 1605: 
 1606:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1607: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1608:     
 1609:     true = unblock_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir).
 1610: 
 1611: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1612: 
 1613: disk_log_internal() ->
 1614:     ["Test mod_disk_log"].
 1615: 
 1616: disk_log_internal(Config) ->
 1617:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1618:     Request = "GET /" ++ integer_to_list(rand:uniform(1000000)) ++ " ",
 1619:     ok = http_status(Request, Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1620:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1621:     Match = list_to_binary(Request ++ Version),
 1622:     disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, disk_log:chunk(Log, start)).
 1623: disk_log_internal1(_, _, eof) ->
 1624:     ct:fail(eof);
 1625: disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, [H | T]}) ->
 1626:     case binary:match(H, Match) of
 1627:         nomatch ->
 1628:             disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, T});
 1629:         _ ->
 1630:             ok
 1631:     end;
 1632: disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, []}) ->
 1633:     disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont)).
 1634: 
 1635: disk_log_exists() ->
 1636:     ["Test mod_disk_log with existing logs"].
 1637: 
 1638: disk_log_exists(Config) ->
 1639:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1640:     Self = self(),
 1641:     Node = node(),
 1642:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1643:     {_, [{bogus, Node, Self} | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start).
 1644: 
 1645: disk_log_bad_size() ->
 1646:     ["Test mod_disk_log with existing log, missing .siz"].
 1647: 
 1648: disk_log_bad_size(Config) ->
 1649:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1650:     Self = self(),
 1651:     Node = node(),
 1652:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1653:     {_, [{bogus, Node, Self} | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start).
 1654: 
 1655: disk_log_bad_file() ->
 1656:     ["Test mod_disk_log with bad file"].
 1657: 
 1658: disk_log_bad_file(Config) ->
 1659:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1660:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1661:     Request = "GET /" ++ integer_to_list(rand:uniform(1000000)) ++ " ",
 1662:     ok = http_status(Request, Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1663:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1664:     Match = list_to_binary(Request ++ Version),
 1665:     {_, [H | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start),
 1666:     {_, _} = binary:match(H, Match).
 1667: 
 1668: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1669: non_disturbing_reconfiger_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1670:     do_reconfiger_dies([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], non_disturbing).
 1671: disturbing_reconfiger_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1672:     do_reconfiger_dies([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], disturbing).
 1673: 
 1674: do_reconfiger_dies(Config, DisturbingType) ->
 1675:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1676:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1677:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1678:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1679:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1680: 
 1681:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1682:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 1683:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1684:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1685:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1686:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_kill_" ++ Version}, 
 1687:                                               {port, Port}|
 1688:                                               proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], DisturbingType) 
 1689:                 end),
 1690:     
 1691:     monitor(process, Pid),
 1692:     exit(Pid, kill),
 1693:     receive 
 1694:         {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} ->
 1695:             ok
 1696:     end,
 1697:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1698:     [{server_name, "httpd_test"}] =  httpd:info(Server, [server_name]).
 1699: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1700: disturbing_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1701:     disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1702: 
 1703: disturbing_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1704:     disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1705: 
 1706: disturbing(Config) when is_list(Config)->
 1707:     LogWatcher = start_log_watcher(),
 1708:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1709:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1710:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1711:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1712:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1713:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1714: 
 1715:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version,  Host),
 1716:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1717:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1718:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1719:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_disturbing_" ++ Version}, {port, Port}|
 1720: 			      proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], disturbing),
 1721:     Close = list_to_atom((typestr(Type)) ++ "_closed"),
 1722:     receive 
 1723: 	{Close, Socket} ->
 1724:             inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1725:             [{server_name, "httpd_disturbing_" ++ Version}] =
 1726:                 httpd:info(Server, [server_name]),
 1727:             [] = stop_log_watcher(LogWatcher),
 1728:             [] = inets_test_lib:flush(),
 1729: 	    ok
 1730:     end.
 1731: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1732: non_disturbing_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1733:     non_disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1734: 
 1735: non_disturbing_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1736:     non_disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1737: 
 1738: non_disturbing(Config) when is_list(Config)->
 1739:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1740:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1741:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1742:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1743:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1744: 
 1745:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1746:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 1747:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1748:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1749:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1750:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_non_disturbing_" ++ Version}, {port, Port}|
 1751: 			      proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], non_disturbing),
 1752:     Transport = type(Type),
 1753:     receive 
 1754: 	{Transport, Socket, Msg} ->
 1755: 	    ct:pal("Received message ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1756: 	    ok
 1757:     after 2000 ->
 1758: 	  ct:fail(timeout)  
 1759:     end,
 1760:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1761:     [{server_name, "httpd_non_disturbing_" ++ Version}] =  httpd:info(Server, [server_name]).
 1762: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1763: reload_config_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1764:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 1765:     HttpdConf = filename:join(get_tmp_dir(Config), "inets_httpd_server.conf"),
 1766:     ServerConfig =
 1767:         "[\n" ++
 1768:         "{bind_address, \"localhost\"}," ++
 1769:         "{port,0}," ++
 1770:         "{server_name,\"httpd_test\"}," ++
 1771:         "{server_root,\"" ++ ServerRoot ++  "\"}," ++
 1772:         "{document_root,\"" ++ proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config) ++ "\"}" ++
 1773:         "].",
 1774:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, ServerConfig),
 1775:     {ok, Server} = inets:start(httpd, [{proplist_file, HttpdConf}]),
 1776:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, httpd:info(Server)),
 1777:     NewConfig =
 1778:         "[\n" ++
 1779:         "{bind_address, \"localhost\"}," ++
 1780:         "{port," ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "}," ++
 1781:         "{server_name,\"httpd_test_new\"}," ++
 1782:         "{server_root,\"" ++ ServerRoot ++  "\"}," ++
 1783:         "{document_root,\"" ++ proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config) ++ "\"}" ++
 1784:         "].",
 1785:     
 1786:     %% Test Erlang term format
 1787:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, NewConfig),
 1788:     ok = httpd:reload_config(HttpdConf, non_disturbing),
 1789:     "httpd_test_new" = proplists:get_value(server_name, httpd:info(Server)).
 1790: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1792:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),

 1794:     {ok,[{"wrl","x-world/x-vrml"},

 1853:      {"texi","application/x-texinfo"},
 1854:      {"tex","application/x-tex"},
 1855:      {"tcl","application/x-tcl"},
 1856:      {"tar","application/x-tar"},
 1857:      {"sv4crc","application/x-sv4crc"},
 1858:      {"sv4cpio","application/x-sv4cpio"},
 1859:      {"sit","application/x-stuffit"},
 1860:      {"shar","application/x-shar"},
 1861:      {"sh","application/x-sh"},
 1862:      {"nc","application/x-netcdf"},
 1863:      {"cdf","application/x-netcdf"},
 1864:      {"mif","application/x-mif"},
 1865:      {"latex","application/x-latex"},
 1866:      {"skp","application/x-koan"},
 1867:      {"skd","application/x-koan"},
 1868:      {"skt","application/x-koan"},
 1869:      {"skm","application/x-koan"},
 1870:      {"cgi","application/x-httpd-cgi"},
 1871:      {"hdf","application/x-hdf"},
 1872:      {"gz","application/x-gzip"},
 1873:      {"gtar","application/x-gtar"},
 1874:      {"dvi","application/x-dvi"},
 1875:      {"dcr","application/x-director"},
 1876:      {"dir","application/x-director"},
 1877:      {"dxr","application/x-director"},
 1878:      {"csh","application/x-csh"},
 1879:      {"cpio","application/x-cpio"},

 1881:      {"vcd","application/x-cdlink"},
 1882:      {"bcpio","application/x-bcpio"},
