 1885:      {"ai","application/postscript"},
 1886:      {"eps","application/postscript"},
 1887:      {"ps","application/postscript"},
 1888:      {"pdf","application/pdf"},
 1889:      {"oda","application/oda"},
 1890:      {"bin","application/octet-stream"},
 1891:      {"dms","application/octet-stream"},
 1892:      {"lha","application/octet-stream"},
 1893:      {"lzh","application/octet-stream"},
 1894:      {"exe","application/octet-stream"},
 1895:      {"class","application/octet-stream"},
 1896:      {"doc","application/msword"},
 1897:      {"cpt","application/mac-compactpro"},
 1898:      {"hqx","application/mac-binhex40"}]} = httpd_conf:load_mime_types(MimeTypes).
 1899: 
 1900: erl_script_timeout_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1901:     ServerConfig = [
 1902:         {modules, [mod_esi]},
 1903:         {erl_script_alias, {"/erl", [httpd_example]}}
 1904:         | Config
 1905:     ],
 1906:     Httpd = init_httpd(esi, ServerConfig),
 1907: 
 1908:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Httpd),
 1909: 
 1910:     %% Default erl_script_timeout is 15.
 1911:     %% Verify:  13 =< erl_script_timeout =< 17
 1912:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 13000, 4000),
 1913: 
 1914:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, {Url, []}, [{timeout, 45000}], []),
 1915:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1916:     verify_body(Body, 13000).
 1917: 
 1918: erl_script_timeout_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1919:     ServerConfig = [
 1920:         {modules, [mod_esi]},
 1921:         {erl_script_timeout, 2},
 1922:         {erl_script_alias, {"/erl", [httpd_example]}}
 1923:         | Config
 1924:     ],
 1925:     ServerInfo = init_httpd(esi, ServerConfig),
 1926:     Pid = proplists:get_value(server_pid, ServerInfo),
 1927:     Info = httpd:info(Pid),
 1928:     verify_timeout(Info, 2),
 1929: 
 1930:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Info),
 1931: 
 1932:     %% Verify:  1 =< erl_script_timeout =< 3
 1933:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 1000, 2000),
 1934: 
 1935:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(Url),
 1936:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1937:     verify_body(Body, 1000).
 1938: 
 1939: erl_script_timeout_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1940:     HttpdConf = filename:join(get_tmp_dir(Config),
 1941:                               "httpd_erl_script_timeout_proplist.conf"),
 1942:     ServerConfig =
 1943:         "[{port, 0},\n" ++
 1944:         " {server_name,\"localhost\"},\n" ++
 1945:         " {server_root,\"./\"},\n" ++
 1946:         " {document_root,\"./\"},\n" ++
 1947:         " {bind_address, any},\n" ++
 1948:         " {mimetypes, [{\"html\", \"text/html\"}]},\n" ++
 1949:         " {modules,[mod_esi]},\n" ++
 1950:         " {erl_script_timeout, 5},\n" ++
 1951:         " {erl_script_alias, {\"/erl\", [httpd_example]}}\n" ++
 1952:         "].",
 1953:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, ServerConfig),
 1954: 
 1955:     {ok, Pid} =	inets:start(httpd,
 1956:                             [{proplist_file, HttpdConf}]),
 1957:     Info = httpd:info(Pid),
 1958:     verify_timeout(Info, 5),
 1959: 
 1960:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Info),
 1961: 
 1962:     %% Verify:  3 =< erl_script_timeout =< 7
 1963:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 3000, 4000),
 1964: 
 1965:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(Url),
 1966:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1967:     verify_body(Body, 3000).
 1968: 
 1969: erl_script_alias_all(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 1970:     ok = start_apps(http_basic),
 1971:     Config1 = [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"},
 1972:                {type, ip_comm} |
 1973:                Config0],
 1974:     Config2 = init_httpd(http_basic_erl_script_alias_all, Config1),
 1975:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
 1976:         	     Config2, [{statuscode, 200}]).
 1977: 
 1978: tls_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1979:     SSLOpts = proplists:get_value(client_alert_conf, Config),    
 1980:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),    
 1981:     {error, {tls_alert, _}} = ssl:connect("localhost", Port, [{verify, verify_peer} | SSLOpts]).
 1982: 
 1983: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1984: %% Internal functions -----------------------------------
 1985: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1986: url(http, End, Config) ->
 1987:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1988:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1989:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 1990: 
 1991: http_get_url(Port0, HeaderDelay, ChunkDelay, BadChunkDelay) ->
 1992:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1993:     Port = integer_to_list(Port0),
 1994:     HD = integer_to_list(HeaderDelay),
 1995:     CD = integer_to_list(ChunkDelay),
 1996:     BD = integer_to_list(BadChunkDelay),
 1997:     "http://" ++ Host ++ ":" ++ Port ++
 1998:         "/erl/httpd_example/get_chunks?header_delay=" ++ HD ++
 1999:         "&chunk_delay=" ++ CD ++
 2000:         "&bad_chunk_delay=" ++ BD.
 2001: 
 2002: verify_body(Body, Timeout0) ->
 2003:     Timeout = integer_to_list(Timeout0),
 2004:     Res = string:find(Body, Timeout),
 2005:     ct:log("Result: ~p~n", [Res]),
 2006:     %% Fail if BAD chunk is found.
 2007:     case Res =:= Timeout ++ " ms\r\n" of
 2008:         true ->
 2009:             ok;
 2010:         false ->
 2011:             ct:fail("Unexpected chunk received!")
 2012:     end.
 2013: 
 2014: verify_timeout(Info, Expected) ->
 2015:     Timeout = proplists:get_value(erl_script_timeout, Info),
 2016:     case Timeout =:= Expected of
 2017:         true ->
 2018:             ok;
 2019:         false ->
 2020:             ct:fail("Bad Timeout - Expected: ~p Got: ~p", [Expected, Timeout])
 2021:     end.
 2022: 
 2023: do_max_clients(Config) ->
 2024:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2025:     Host    = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 2026:     Port    = proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
 2027:     Type    = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2028:     
 2029:     Request = http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
 2030:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi_bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 2031:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 2032:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 2033:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, 
 2034: 				       Port,
 2035: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2036: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2037: 				       Request,
 2038: 				       [{statuscode, 503},
 2039: 					{version, Version}]),
 2040:     receive 
 2041: 	{_, Socket, _Msg} ->
 2042: 	    ok
 2043:     end,
 2044:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 2045:     ct:sleep(5000), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 2046:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, 
 2047: 				       Port,
 2048: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2049: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2050: 				       Request,
 2051: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 2052: 					{version, Version}]).
 2053: 
 2054: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->
 2055:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2056:     AuthDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "auth"),
 2057:     PicsDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "icons"),
 2058:     ConfigDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "config"),
 2059: 
 2060:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2061:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2062:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2063:     ok = file:make_dir(AuthDir),
 2064:     ok = file:make_dir(PicsDir),
 2065:     ok = file:make_dir(ConfigDir),
 2066: 
 2067:     DocSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/htdocs"),
 2068:     AuthSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/auth"),
 2069:     CgiSrc =  filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/cgi-bin"),
 2070:     PicsSrc =  filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/icons"),
 2071:     ConfigSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/config"),
 2072: 
 2073:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(DocSrc, DocRoot),
 2074:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(AuthSrc, AuthDir),
 2075:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(CgiSrc, CgiDir),
 2076:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(PicsSrc, PicsDir),
 2077:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(ConfigSrc, ConfigDir),
 2078: 
 2079:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2080: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2081: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2082: 	      _ ->
 2083: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2084: 	  end,
 2085: 
 2086:     inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2087:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2088:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2089:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}),
 2090: 
 2091:     EnvCGI =  filename:join([ServerRoot, "cgi-bin", "printenv.sh"]),
 2092:     {ok, FileInfo1} = file:read_file_info(EnvCGI),
 2093:     ok = file:write_file_info(EnvCGI,
 2094: 			      FileInfo1#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2095: 
 2096: setup_tmp_dir(PrivDir) ->
 2097:     TmpDir =  filename:join(PrivDir, "tmp"),
 2098:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir).
 2099: 
 2100: get_tmp_dir(Config) ->
 2101:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2102:     filename:join(PrivDir, "tmp").
 2103: 
 2104: start_apps(Group) when  Group == https_basic;
 2105: 			Group == https_limit;
 2106: 			Group == https_custom;
 2107: 			Group == https_basic_auth;
 2108: 			Group == https_auth_api;
 2109: 			Group == https_auth_api_dets;
 2110: 			Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
 2111: 			Group == https_security;
 2112: 			Group == https_reload;
 2113:                         Group == https_not_sup;
 2114:                         Group == https_alert
 2115: 			->
 2116:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets, asn1, crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2117: start_apps(Group) when  Group == http_basic;
 2118: 			Group == http_limit;
 2119: 			Group == http_custom;
 2120: 			Group == http_basic_auth;
 2121: 			Group == http_auth_api;
 2122: 			Group == http_auth_api_dets;
 2123: 			Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;
 2124: 			Group == http_security;
 2125: 			Group == http_logging;
 2126: 			Group == http_reload;
 2127:                         Group == http_post;
 2128:                         Group == http_default_type;
 2129:                         Group == http_mime_type;
 2130:                         Group == http_mime_and_default_type;
 2131:                         Group == http_mime_types;
 2132:                         Group == http_rel_path_script_alias;
 2133:                         Group == http_not_sup;
 2134:                         Group == http_mime_types;
 2135:                         Group == esi ->
 2136:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets]).
 2137: 
 2138: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2139:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2140:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2141:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2142:     {Pid, proplists:get_value(port, Info)}.
 2143: 
 2144: init_ssl(Group, Config) ->
 2145:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
 2146:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
 2147:     GenCertData = #{client_config := CConf} =
 2148:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
 2149:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}, {digest, sha256}],
 2150:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}, {digest, sha256}]],
 2151:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}, {digest, sha256}]},
 2152:                                     client_chain =>
 2153:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}, {digest, sha256}],
 2154:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}, {digest, sha256}]],
 2155:                                     peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}, {digest, sha256}]}}),
 2156:     [_ | CAs] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, CConf),
 2157:     AlertConf = [{cacerts, CAs} |  proplists:delete(cacerts, CConf)],
 2158:     Conf = inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
 2159:     case start_apps(Group) of
 2160: 	ok ->
 2161: 	    init_httpd(Group, [{client_alert_conf, AlertConf}, {type, ssl}, {ssl_conf, Conf} | Config]);
 2162: 	_ ->
 2163: 	    {skip, "Could not start https apps"}
 2164:     end.
 2165: 
 2166: server_config(http_basic, Config) ->
 2167:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2168: server_config(http_basic_erl_script_alias_all, Config) ->
 2169:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(http_erl_script_alias_all, Config);
 2170: server_config(https_basic, Config) ->
 2171:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2172: server_config(http_not_sup, Config) ->
 2173:     not_sup_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2174: server_config(https_not_sup, Config) ->
 2175:     not_sup_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2176: server_config(http_reload, Config) ->
 2177:     [{keep_alive_timeout, 2}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2178: server_config(http_post, Config) ->
 2179:     [{max_client_body_chunk, 10}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2180: server_config(https_reload, Config) ->
 2181:     [{keep_alive_timeout, 2}]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2182: server_config(http_limit, Config) ->
 2183:     Conf = [{max_clients, 1},
 2184:             {disable_chunked_transfer_encoding_send, true},
 2185: 	    %% Make sure option checking code is run
 2186: 	    {max_content_length, 100000002}]  ++ server_config(http, Config),
 2187:     ct:pal("Received message ~p~n", [Conf]),
 2188:     Conf;
 2189: server_config(http_custom, Config) ->
 2190:     [{customize, ?MODULE}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2191: server_config(https_custom, Config) ->
 2192:     [{customize, ?MODULE}]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2193: server_config(https_limit, Config) ->
 2194:     [{max_clients, 1},
 2195:      {disable_chunked_transfer_encoding_send, true}
 2196:     ]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2197: server_config(http_basic_auth, Config) ->
 2198:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2199:     auth_conf(ServerRoot)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2200: server_config(https_basic_auth, Config) ->
 2201:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2202:     auth_conf(ServerRoot)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2203: server_config(http_auth_api, Config) ->
 2204:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2205:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, plain)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2206: server_config(https_auth_api, Config) ->
 2207:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2208:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, plain)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2209: server_config(http_auth_api_dets, Config) ->
 2210:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2211:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, dets)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2212: server_config(https_auth_api_dets, Config) ->
 2213:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2214:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, dets)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2215: server_config(http_auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
 2216:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2217:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, mnesia)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2218: server_config(https_auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
 2219:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2220:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, mnesia)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2221: server_config(http_security, Config) ->
 2222:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2223:     tl(auth_conf(ServerRoot)) ++ security_conf(ServerRoot) ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2224: server_config(https_security, Config) ->
 2225:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2226:     tl(auth_conf(ServerRoot)) ++ security_conf(ServerRoot) ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2227: server_config(http_logging, Config) ->
 2228:     log_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2229: server_config(http_default_type, Config) ->
 2230:     [{default_type, "text/html"}] ++ basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2231: server_config(http_mime_type, Config) ->
 2232:     [{mime_type, "text/html"}] ++ basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2233: server_config(http_mime_and_default_type, Config) ->
 2234:     [{default_type, "text/richtext"}, {mime_type, "text/html"}] ++ basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2235: server_config(http_mime_types, Config0) ->
 2236:     Config1 = basic_conf() ++  server_config(http, Config0),
 2237:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
 2238:     MimeTypesFile = filename:join([ServerRoot,"config", "mime.types"]),
 2239:     [{mime_types, MimeTypesFile} | proplists:delete(mime_types, Config1)];
 2240: server_config(https_alert, Config) ->
 2241:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2242: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2243:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2244:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot,
 2245:                     filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/", [httpd_example, io]);
 2246: server_config(http_erl_script_alias_all, Config) ->
 2247:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2248:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot, "./cgi-bin/", [all]);
 2249: server_config(http_rel_path_script_alias, Config) ->
 2250:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2251:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot, "./cgi-bin/", [httpd_example, io]);
 2252: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2253:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2254:     ServerConf = proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf),
 2255:     [{socket_type, {ssl,
 2256: 		    [{nodelay, true} | ServerConf]}}]
 2257:         ++ proplists:delete(socket_type, server_config(http, Config));
 2258: server_config(esi, Config) ->
 2259:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config).
 2260: 
 2261: config_template(Config, ServerRoot, ScriptPath, Modules) ->
 2262:     [{port, 0},
 2263:      {socket_type, {ip_comm, [{nodelay, true}]}},
 2264:      {server_name,"httpd_test"},
 2265:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2266:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2267:      {bind_address, any},
 2268:      {ipfamily, proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config)},
 2269:      {max_header_size, 256},
 2270:      {max_header_action, close},
 2271:      {directory_index, ["index.html", "welcome.html"]},
 2272:      {mime_types, [{"html","text/html"},{"htm","text/html"}, {"shtml","text/html"},
 2273: 		   {"gif", "image/gif"}]},
 2274:      {alias, {"/icons/", filename:join(ServerRoot,"icons") ++ "/"}},
 2275:      {re_write, {"/pic(ture)?s/",  filename:join(ServerRoot,"icons") ++ "/"}},
 2276:      {script_alias, {"/htbin/", ScriptPath}},
 2277:      {script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/", ScriptPath}},
 2278:      {script_re_write, {"/cgi-([a-zA-Z-]*)bin/", ScriptPath}},
 2279:      {erl_script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/erl", Modules}}
 2280:     ] ++ custom_config_options(Config).
 2281: 
 2282: custom_config_options([{Name, _} = Option | Rest]) when Name == erl_script_alias;
 2283:                                                         Name == erl_script_timeout ->
 2284:     [Option | custom_config_options(Rest)];
 2285: custom_config_options([_ | Rest]) ->
 2286:     custom_config_options(Rest);
 2287: custom_config_options([]) ->
 2288:     [].
 2289: 
 2290: init_httpd(Group, Config0) ->
 2291:     Config1 = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
 2292:     Config = proplists:delete(server_pid, Config1),
 2293:     {Pid, Port} = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
 2294:     [{server_pid, Pid}, {port, Port} | Config].
 2295: 
 2296: http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host, {Headers, Body}) ->
 2297:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host ++ "\r\n" ++ Headers ++ "\r\n" ++ Body;
 2298: http_request(Request, Version, _, {Headers, Body}) ->
 2299:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n" ++ Headers  ++ "\r\n" ++ Body.
 2300: 
 2301: http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2302:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n";
 2303: http_request(Request, Version, _) ->
 2304:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n\r\n".
 2305: 
 2306: auth_request(Path, User, Passwd, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2307:     "GET " ++ Path ++ " " ++ Version ++  "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++
 2308: 	"\r\nAuthorization: Basic " ++  
 2309: 	base64:encode_to_string(User++":"++Passwd) ++
 2310: 	"\r\n\r\n";
 2311: auth_request(Path, User, Passwd, Version, _Host) ->
 2312:     "GET " ++ Path ++ " " ++ Version ++  
 2313: 	"\r\nAuthorization: Basic " ++  
 2314: 	base64:encode_to_string(User++":"++Passwd) ++
 2315: 	"\r\n\r\n".
 2316: 
 2317: http_request_missing_CR(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2318:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n\n";
 2319: http_request_missing_CR(Request, Version, _) ->
 2320:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n\n".
 2321: 
 2322: head_status("HTTP/0.9", _) ->
 2323:     501; %% Not implemented in HTTP/0.9
 2324: head_status(_, Expected) ->
 2325:     Expected.
 2326: 
 2327: 
 2328: basic_conf() ->
 2329:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_range, mod_responsecontrol,
 2330: 		mod_trace, mod_esi, ?MODULE, mod_cgi, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2331:      {logger, [{error, httpd_test}]}].
 2332: 
 2333: do(ModData) ->
 2334:     case whereis(propagate_test) of
 2335:         undefined ->
 2336:             ok;
 2337:         _ ->
 2338:             {already_sent, Status, _Size} = proplists:get_value(response, ModData#mod.data),
 2339:             propagate_test ! {status, Status}              
 2340:     end,
 2341:     {proceed, ModData#mod.data}.
 2342: 
 2343: not_sup_conf() ->
 2344:     [{modules, [mod_get]}].
 2345: 
 2346: auth_access_conf() ->
 2347:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]}].
 2348: 
 2349: auth_conf(Root) ->
 2350:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2351:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/open"), 
 2352: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2353: 		   {auth_name, "Open Area"},
 2354: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2355: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2356: 		   {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]}]}},
 2357:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret"), 
 2358: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2359: 		   {auth_name, "Secret Area"},
 2360: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2361: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2362: 		   {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]}]}},
 2363:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret/top_secret"), 
 2364: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2365: 		   {auth_name, "Top Secret Area"},
 2366: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2367: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2368: 		   {require_group, ["group3"]}]}}].

 2429: security_conf(Root) ->
 2430:     SecFile = filename:join(Root, "security_data"),
 2431:     Open = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/open"),
 2432:     Secret = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret"),
 2433:     TopSecret = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret/top_secret"), 
 2434: 	
 2435:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_security, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2436:      {security_directory, {Open, 
 2437: 			   [{auth_name, "Open Area"},
 2438: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2439: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2440: 			    {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]} | 
 2441: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, Open)]}},
 2442:      {security_directory, {Secret, 
 2443: 			   [{auth_name, "Secret Area"},
 2444: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2445: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2446: 			    {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]} |
 2447: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, Secret)]}},
 2448:      {security_directory, {TopSecret,
 2449: 			   [{auth_name, "Top Secret Area"},
 2450: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2451: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2452: 			    {require_group, ["group3"]} |
 2453: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, TopSecret)]}}].     
 2454: 
 2455: mod_security_conf(SecFile, Dir) ->
 2456:     [{data_file, SecFile},
 2457:      {max_retries, 3},
 2458:      {fail_expire_time, ?FAIL_EXPIRE_TIME},
 2459:      {block_time, 1},
 2460:      {auth_timeout, ?AUTH_TIMEOUT},
 2461:      {callback_module, ?MODULE},
 2462:      {path, Dir} %% This is should not be needed, but is atm, awful design! 
 2463:     ].
 2464:     
 2465: log_conf() ->
 2466:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head, mod_disk_log]},
 2467:      {transfer_disk_log, "httpd_log_transfer"},
 2468:      {security_disk_log, "httpd_log_security"},
 2469:      {error_disk_log, "httpd_log_error"},
 2470:      {transfer_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2471:      {error_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2472:      {error_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2473:      {security_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2474:      {disk_log_format, internal}].
 2475: 
 2476: http_status(Request, Config, Expected) ->
 2477:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2478:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),    
 2479:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2480:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2481: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2482: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2483: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2484: 				  http_request(Request, Version, Host),
 2485: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2486: 
 2487: http_status(Request, HeadersAndBody, Config, Expected) ->
 2488:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2489:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 2490:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2491:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2492: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2493: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2494: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2495: 				  http_request(Request, Version, Host, HeadersAndBody),
 2496: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2497: 
 2498: auth_status(AuthRequest, Config, Expected) ->
 2499:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2500:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),    
 2501:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2502:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2503: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2504: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2505: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2506: 				  AuthRequest,
 2507: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2508: 
 2509: basic_auth_requiered(Config) -> 
 2510:     ok = http_status("GET /open/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2511: 					      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
 2512:     ok = http_status("GET /secret/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2513: 						{header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
 2514:     ok = http_status("GET /secret/top_secret/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2515: 						      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]).  
 2516: 
 2517: start_mnesia(Node) ->
 2518:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, cleanup_mnesia, []) of
 2519: 	ok ->
 2520: 	    ok;
 2521: 	Other ->
 2522: 	    ct:fail({failed_to_cleanup_mnesia, Other})
 2523:     end,
 2524:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, setup_mnesia, []) of
 2525: 	{atomic, ok} ->
 2526: 	    ok;
 2527: 	Other2 ->
 2528: 	    ct:fail({failed_to_setup_mnesia, Other2})
 2529:     end,
 2530:     ok.
 2531: 
 2532: setup_mnesia() ->
 2533:     setup_mnesia([node()]).
 2534: 
 2535: setup_mnesia(Nodes) ->
 2536:     ok = mnesia:create_schema(Nodes),
 2537:     ok = mnesia:start(),
 2538:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(httpd_user,
 2539: 				       [{attributes, 
 2540: 					 record_info(fields, httpd_user)}, 
 2541: 					{disc_copies,Nodes}, {type, set}]),
 2542:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(httpd_group,
 2543: 				       [{attributes, 
 2544: 					 record_info(fields,
 2545: 						     httpd_group)}, 
 2546: 					{disc_copies,Nodes}, {type,bag}]).
 2547: 
 2548: cleanup_mnesia() ->
 2549:     mnesia:start(),
 2550:     mnesia:delete_table(httpd_user),
 2551:     mnesia:delete_table(httpd_group),
 2552:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
 2553:     mnesia:delete_schema([node()]),
 2554:     ok.
 2555: 
 2556: transport_opts(ssl, Config) ->
 2557:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2558:     ClientConf = proplists:get_value(client_config, SSLConf),
 2559:     [proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config) | ClientConf];
 2560: transport_opts(_, Config) ->
 2561:     [proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config)].
 2562: 
 2563: 
 2564: %%% mod_range
 2565: create_range_data(Path) ->
 2566:     PathAndFileName=filename:join([Path,"range.txt"]),
 2567:     case file:read_file(PathAndFileName) of
 2568: 	{error, enoent} ->
 2569: 	    file:write_file(PathAndFileName,list_to_binary(["12345678901234567890",
 2570: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2571: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2572: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2573: 							    "12345678901234567890"]));
 2574: 	_ ->
 2575: 	    ok
 2576:     end.
 2577: 
 2578: dos_hostname(Type, Port, Host, Node, Version, Max) ->    
 2579:     TooLongHeader = lists:append(lists:duplicate(Max + 1, "a")),
 2580:     
 2581:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2582:  				       dos_hostname_request("", Version),
 2583:  				       [{statuscode, 200},
 2584:  					{version, Version}]),
 2585:     
 2586:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2587:  				       dos_hostname_request("dummy-host.ericsson.se", Version),
 2588:  				       [{statuscode, 200},
 2589:  					{version, Version}]),
 2590:     
 2591:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2592:  				       dos_hostname_request(TooLongHeader, Version),
 2593:  				       [{statuscode, request_entity_too_large_code(Version)},
 2594:  					{version, Version}]).
 2595: dos_hostname_request(Host, Version) ->
 2596:     dos_http_request("GET / ", Version, Host).
 2597: 
 2598: dos_http_request(Request,  "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2599:     http_request(Request, Version, Host);
 2600: dos_http_request(Request, Version, Host) ->
 2601:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n".
 2602: 
 2603: request_entity_too_large_code("HTTP/1.0") ->
 2604:     403; %% 413 not defined in HTTP/1.0
 2605: request_entity_too_large_code(_) ->
 2606:     413.
 2607: 
 2608: length_required_code("HTTP/1.0") ->
 2609:     403; %% 411 not defined in HTTP/1.0
 2610: length_required_code(_) ->
 2611:     411.
 2612: 
 2613: garbage_content_length(Type, Port, Host, Node, Version) ->    
 2614:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2615:      				       garbage_content_length_request("GET / ", Version, Host, "aaaa"),	
 2616:      				       [{statuscode, length_required_code(Version)},
 2617:       					{version, Version}]),
 2618:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2619: 				       garbage_content_length_request("GET / ", Version, Host, 
 2620: 								      lists:duplicate($a, 100)),	
 2621:  				       [{statuscode, request_entity_too_large_code(Version)},
 2622:  					{version, Version}]).
 2623:  
 2624: garbage_content_length_request(Request, Version, Host, Garbage) ->	
 2625:     http_request(Request, Version, Host,
 2626: 		 {"content-length:" ++ Garbage, "Body with garbage content length indicator"}).
 2627:

 2629: update_password(Node, ServerRoot, _Address, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, Old, New)->
 2630:     Directory = filename:join([ServerRoot, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2631:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, update_password, 
 2632: 	     [undefined, Port, Directory, Old, New, New]).
 2633: 
 2634: add_user(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User, Password, UserData) ->
 2635:     Addr = undefined, 
 2636:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2637:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, add_user, 
 2638: 	     [User, Password, UserData, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2639: 
 2640: 
 2641: delete_user(Node, Root, _Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User) ->
 2642:     Addr = undefined, 
 2643:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2644:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, delete_user, [User, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2645: remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2646:     %% List users, delete them, and make sure they are gone.
 2647:     case list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) of
 2648: 	{ok, Users} ->
 2649: 	    lists:foreach(fun(User) -> 
 2650: 				  delete_user(Node, ServerRoot, Host, 
 2651: 					      Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User)
 2652: 			  end,
 2653: 			  Users),
 2654: 		  {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir);
 2655: 	_ ->
 2656: 	    ok
 2657:     end.
 2658: 
 2659: list_users(Node, Root, _Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2660:     Addr = undefined, 
 2661:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2662:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_users, [Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2663: 
 2664: remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port,  AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2665:     {ok, Groups} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir),
 2666:     lists:foreach(fun(Group) ->
 2667: 			  delete_group(Node, Group, Port, ServerRoot, AuthPrefix, Dir)
 2668: 		  end,
 2669: 		  Groups),
 2670:     {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir).
 2671: 
 2672: delete_group(Node, Group, Port, Root, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2673:     Addr = undefined, 
 2674:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2675:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, delete_group, [Group, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2676: 
 2677: list_groups(Node, Root, _, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2678:     Addr = undefined, 
 2679:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2680:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_groups, [Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2681: 
 2682: add_group_member(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User, Group) ->
 2683:     Addr = undefined, 
 2684:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2685:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, add_group_member, [Group, User, Addr, Port, 
 2686: 					  Directory]).
 2687: list_group_members(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, Group) ->
 2688:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2689:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_group_members, [Group, [{port, Port}, {dir, Directory}]]).

 2691: getaddr() ->
 2692:     {ok,HostName} = inet:gethostname(),
 2693:     {ok,{A1,A2,A3,A4}} = inet:getaddr(HostName,inet),
 2694:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p.~p.~p.~p",[A1,A2,A3,A4])).
 2695: 
 2696: receive_security_event(Event, Node, Port) ->
 2697:     receive 
 2698: 	Event ->
 2699: 	    ok;
 2700: 	{'EXIT', _, _} ->
 2701: 	    receive_security_event(Event, Node, Port)
 2702:     after 5000 ->
 2703: 	    %% Flush the message queue, to see if we got something...
 2704: 	    inets_test_lib:flush()
 2705:     end.
 2706:

 2709:     rpc:call(Node, mod_security, list_blocked_users, [Addr,Port]).

 2731: event(What, Port, Dir, Data) ->
 2732:     Msg = {event, What, Port, Dir, Data},
 2733:     case global:whereis_name(mod_security_test) of
 2734: 	undefined ->
 2735: 	    ok;
 2736: 	_Pid ->
 2737: 	    global:send(mod_security_test, Msg)
 2738:     end.
 2739: 
 2740: type(ip_comm) ->
 2741:     tcp;
 2742: type(_) ->
 2743:     ssl.
 2744: 
 2745: typestr(ip_comm) ->
 2746:     "tcp";
 2747: typestr(_) ->
 2748:     "ssl".
 2749: 
 2750: response_header({"server", _}) ->
 2751:     false;
 2752: response_header(Header) ->
 2753:     {true, Header}.
 2754: 
 2755: response_default_headers() ->
 2756:     [%% Add new header
 2757:      {"X-Frame-Options", "SAMEORIGIN"},
 2758:      %% Override built-in default
 2759:      {"Date", "Override-date"}].
 2760: 
 2761: peer(Config) ->
 2762:    case proplists:get_value(type, Config) of
 2763:       ssl ->
 2764:         "true";
 2765:       _ ->
 2766:         "false"
 2767:    end.   
 2768: 
 2769: start_log_watcher() ->
 2770:     Spawner = self(),
 2771:     EventDest = erlang:alias(),
 2772:     HandlerId = ?MODULE,
 2773:     _ =
 2774:         spawn(
 2775:           fun () ->
 2776:                   MonAlias =
 2777:                       monitor(process, Spawner, [{alias,reply_demonitor}]),
 2778:                   EventDest ! {started,EventDest,MonAlias},
 2779:                   receive
 2780:                       {stop,MonAlias} ->
 2781:                           _ = logger:remove_handler(HandlerId),
 2782:                           EventDest ! {stopped,EventDest},
 2783:                           ok;
 2784:                       {'DOWN',MonAlias,_,_,_} ->
 2785:                           _ = logger:remove_handler(HandlerId),
 2786:                           ok
 2787:                   end
 2788:           end),
 2789:     receive
 2790:         {started,EventDest,Watcher} ->
 2791:             Config = #{ config => EventDest },
 2792:             ok = logger:add_handler(HandlerId, ?MODULE, Config),
 2793:             {EventDest,Watcher}
 2794:     end.
 2795: 
 2796: stop_log_watcher({EventDest,Watcher}) ->
 2797:     Watcher ! {stop,Watcher},
 2798:     receive
 2799:         {stopped,EventDest} ->
 2800:             true = unalias(EventDest),
 2801:             stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest)
 2802:     end.
 2803: %%
 2804: stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest) ->
 2805:     receive
 2806:         {event,EventDest,Event} ->
 2807:             [Event | stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest)]
 2808:     after 0 ->
 2809:             []
 2810:     end.
 2811: 
 2812: log(#{level := Level} = Event, #{ config := EventDest }) ->
 2813:     %% Pass on events of level 'error' or worse
 2814:     case logger:compare_levels(Level, error) of
 2815:         lt ->
 2816:             ok;
 2817:         _ ->
 2818:             EventDest ! {event,EventDest,Event},
 2819:             ok
 2820:     end.
